post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Job Snapshot
Location: Toronto, Ontario (Map it! )
Employee Type: Full-Time Employee
Manages Others: Not Specified
Job Type: Information Technology
Experience: At least 3 year(s)
Post Date: 05/06/2010 Contact Information
Ref ID: 4507830
Description
Mobile Applications Developer
Our Toronto Client requires a Mobile Applications Developer with at least 3 years experience.Required Skills:At least 3 years of Mobile development experience on various Mobile platforms (Blackberry, IPhone, Android, J2ME);Experience with web services;Experience with XML (SAX/DOM/XSLT/etc);Experience using Eclipse, RIM Blackberry IDEAssets:Experience on developing mobile application at Trusted Execution Environment;Experience on developing applications that manages mobile devices' secure elements;Java Card, NFC contactless applet experience with STK;Experience on JSR177, JSR257;Experience on using build technologies (ANT, Maven, etc)This is a permanent position (including benefits)and located downtown Toronto, minutes away from public transit.
post.title: Mobile Applications Developer
